# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

* Solicitation Number: 2BH3162528/AD
* Department: Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada
* Notification Period: 14 days (March 13 to 26, 2024)

## Description of Requirement

Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada requires five (5) units of Apple 16-inch MacBook Pros with M3 Max Chip, including AppleCare+ warranty and Storage Media Retention or equivalent. Additionally, client and inventory options are required, as specified in the List of Deliverables within the Request for Quotation.

## Delivery Destination and Schedule

* Delivery Destination: Gatineau, Quebec
* Delivery Date: 30 federal government working days from contract award

## Security Requirements and CLCA

* Security Requirements: N/A
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA): N/A

## Terms and Conditions

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
* Bids must be submitted only through the P2P portal for RFQ Submission by the specified date, time, and place.

## Contact Information

* Procurement Officer: Michael Boualavong
* Email: michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 402-8895
* Address: Shared Services Canada, 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8

## Additional Information

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* All inquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing.
* To access the solicitation and submit a bid, click on the following link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
